sentences.sContent: They used slings of rope to lower us from one set of arms to another.
sentences.sCn: 他们用几条绳索把我们从一组吊臂降到另外一组吊臂。

sentences.sContent: She slung her coat over her desk chair.
sentences.sCn: 她把外衣搭在了桌椅背上。

sentences.sContent: He had a small green backpack slung over one shoulder.
sentences.sCn: 他把一只绿色小背包搭在一边肩上。

words.tran: 投石者；吊物工人；摔砂造模机；吊环

trans.tranOther: a set of ropes or strong pieces of cloth that are used to lift and carry heavy objects
If you sling something over your shoulder or over something such as a chair, you hang it there loosely
